dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body:
ISP: University of Pennsylvania

The Subpoena basically states that the university of Pennsylvania is under obligation to provide "information, including names, current and permanent addresses, telephone numbers, e-mail addresses, and Media Access Control addresses sufficient to identify the alleged infringers of copyrighted sound recordings: who were assigned identified IP addresses at specified times.

My Side: At the time the IP was captured (165.123.142.229 2007-06-01), I was no longer a Penn Student/affiliated with the university, and as a matter of fact, I had no P2P software installed in my computer. This is clearly a case of mistaken identity and I don't understand how I can be accused of downloading/uploading/sharing files when I didn't even have the software necessary

Secondly, this subpoena was served in Philadelphia and since I am no longer a resident nor do I work in that city/state, the Eastern District of Pennsylvania does not have jurisdiction over this case.
dmca.principal_name: University of Pennsylania on behalf of SONG BMG
